Zul'jin.name: Grievous Throw
Zul'jin.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 8 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

Zul'jin.name: Twin Cleave
Zul'jin.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage and slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

Zul'jin.name: Regeneration
Zul'jin.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 25% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

Zul'jin.name: Taz'dingo!
Zul'jin.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

Zul'jin.name: Guillotine
Zul'jin.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

Zul'jin.name: Berserker
Zul'jin.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.  Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.

1.name: Arcanite Axes
1.description: Lower the cooldown of Twin Cleave by 0.75 seconds for every Hero hit.  Passive: While below 50% Health, Ability Power is increased by 25%.

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies, and the bonus damage is increased by 30%.

1.name: You Want Axe?
1.description: Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 1.25. Reward: After attacking Heroes 120 times, his Attack Range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Headhunter
4.description: Quest: Get a takedown on all unique enemy Heroes. Reward: Activate to reveal all enemy Heroes for 4 seconds.

4.name: Let the Killing Begin
4.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 6%, up to 30%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration. Hero Takedowns instantly grant 30% Attack Speed.

7.name: Recklessness
7.description: While Zul'jin is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 25%.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.description: Increases the number of bonus damage Basic Attack hits from Grievous Throw to 6. Basic Attacks against afflicted Heroes reduces the Cooldown of Grievous Throw by 2 seconds.

7.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
7.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave Axes at the same time, they take 150 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Grievous Throw increases Zul'jin's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Forest Medicine
13.description: Regeneration no longer has to be channeled, allowing Zul'jin to perform other actions while Regenerating. However, taking damage will still end the effect.

13.name: Voodoo Shuffle
13.description: Activate to remove all current Root and Slow effects on Zul'jin.

16.name: Ferocity
16.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 35%.

16.name: Lacerate
16.description: Increases the slow amount of each Twin Cleave Axe by an additional 15%.

16.name: Swirling Death
16.description: Twin Cleave's Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution, but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: When Taz'dingo ends, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, the Guillotine continues forward, dealing 50% of Guillotine's damage to enemies in the line.

20.name: Ensnare
20.description: Throw a net forward, rooting the first enemy hit for 3 seconds.
